definition: Samantabhadra, the Buddhist Lord of Truth
general/popular/everywhere/universal
worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
Samantabhadra, the Buddhist Lord of Truth

sentences.english: I will write the Gatha you requested.
sentences.chinese: 我将写您所提请的普贤大圆满偈。

sentences.english: If one hasn't practiced Samantabhadra's vows, he is still in the stage of initial resolve.
sentences.chinese: 然还未行普贤之行，故仅仅是发心和誓愿阶段。

sentences.english: Buddha Samantabhadra Bodhisattva is one of the three disciples.
sentences.chinese: 普贤菩萨又是佛祖三大弟子之一。
